properties.name: app.auth.provider
properties.description: Auth provider to use. Possible values: 'database', 'database_engine', 'active_directory'.

properties.name: jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Json Web Token (JWT) secret key used for signing and verifying tokens.

properties.name: jwt.expiration-time
properties.description: Json Web Token (JWT) expiration time in milliseconds.
